expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Kong et al. (2010)	bedrock	Kong2010-3	Huan2008-D	R9205	-72.8925	75.064	2267	3	2.7	1	47600000	700000	NIST_27900	204000000	6000000	Z92-0222	2003	1940000	30000	1520000	40000	1992465	187062	50222	1450488	233922	94588	-

Reference:
Kong P, Huang FX, Liu XH, Fink D, Ding L, Lai QZ, 2010. Late Miocene ice sheet elevation in the Grove Mountains, East Antarctica, inferred from cosmogenic 21Ne–10Be–26Al. Global and Planetary Change 72, 50-54.

Data comments:
Sampling year assumed to be 2003.
